CustomField.description: Recipients marked as "Delegator to Form-Filler" may review the document but can't fill the document. They need to forward the document to another user who may fill the document.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Recipients marked as "Delegator to Form-Filler" may review the document but can't fill the document. They need to forward the document to another user who may fill the document.
CustomField.label: Enable Delegate Form Filler Role
